subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
World Baseball Classic
Olympic Games (2006)
lead_paragraph: The worst Wimbledon of the Open era for the U.S. is not an anomaly but a trend. Our foam finger — proclaiming we're No. 1 — has lost its point.
snippet: The worst Wimbledon of the Open era for the U.S. is not an anomaly but a trend. Our foam finger — proclaiming we're No. 1 — has lost its point.
